info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:46PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Caldwell and north central Burke Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Lenoir, or 6 miles northwest of Gamewell, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lenoir, Gamewell, Edgemont and Collettsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
